body_text:
We currently have no way of reporting client-side errors that occur when executing actions in the add-on. We need to be able to know when we hit errors in the client so that we can fix them. This includes both errors in the actions themselves, and errors in the add-on.
To a lesser extent, it'd also be very nice to get error reports when the admin interface malfunctions.
There's not really a spec here; anything we can do to get better visibility into these kinds of failures is useful.
